metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16711 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The swf_DefineLosslessBitsTagToImage function in lib/modules/swfbits.c inSWFTools 0.9.2 mishandles an uncompress failure, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andapplication crash) because of extractDefinitions in lib/readers/swf.c andfill_line_bitmap in lib/devices/render.c, as demonstrated by swfrender.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
